data.medicineUsage: Used for relief of pain and fever, often taken in cases of headaches, toothaches, and muscle pain.
data.sideEffect: Possible side effects include nausea, dizziness, and allergic reactions in rare cases.

data.medicineUsage: Used to relieve moderate to severe pain, especially post-surgery or injury.
data.sideEffect: May cause stomach upset, drowsiness, or, in rare cases, kidney issues.

data.medicineUsage: An antihistamine used for treating allergy symptoms such as runny nose, itchy eyes, or skin rashes.
data.sideEffect: Common side effects include dry mouth, headache, and drowsiness.

data.medicineUsage: Used to manage chronic allergy symptoms such as sneezing, itching, or hives.
data.sideEffect: May cause headaches, stomach upset, or fatigue.
